name: Echo Ball
description:
Echo Ball is an arcade style game with a focus on precise movement and high scores.

Avoid contact with the Echo Ball and its echoes while increasing your score and survival time.

Utilize slowed time and bombs to keep the pressure low or you'll find yourself outnumbered fast.

Use fullscreen for best results.

Made in a week for the 2021.2 Brackeys Game Jam

Code & Assets: Joshua Hilliard (Iatroph)

Music: Kenny Tran (Undead Knightmare)
